anime.description: In a world where humanity lives within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans.
anime.title: Attack on Titan

anime.description: Five years after his victory over Piccolo Jr., Son Goku now lives a peaceful life.
anime.title: Dragon Ball Z

anime.description: Eikichi Onizuka, a 22-year-old ex-biker gang leader and martial artist, becomes a teacher to inspire and guide his students while dealing with their personal issues.
anime.title: Great Teacher Onizuka

anime.description: Yuji Itadori is a high school student with exceptional physical abilities.
anime.title: Jujutsu Kaisen (TV)

anime.description: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger.
anime.title: One Piece

anime.description: A college student, Iori Kitahara, moves to a seaside town and joins a diving club filled with eccentric characters.
anime.title: Grand Blue

anime.description: In a world of magic, where hunters awaken tremendous power within themselves, one lowly hunter, Jinwoo, is on a path to become the world's strongest.
anime.title: Solo Leveling

anime.description: Banished by his father, the crippled ronin Hyakkimaru travels the countryside with a young thief named Dororo, facing dangerous monsters.
anime.title: Dororo

anime.description: After being in a coma for 17 years, a man discovers that he has been transported to another world and returns to his normal life with magical powers.
anime.title: Isekai Ojisan

anime.description: Denji is a teenage boy living in poverty, forced to kill Devils to repay his debt. After an unexpected turn of events, he gains the powers of a Devil and becomes a Public Safety Devil Hunter.
anime.title: Chainsaw Man

anime.description: The misadventures of Doraemon, a robot cat from the 22nd century, who with his gadgets, is sent back in time to help make Nobita Nobi, a boy without much talent, a better person.
anime.title: Doraemon

anime.description: In a post-apocalyptic world called Alcia, Hina Farrow is on a journey to find a Legendary Ace after her mother is dragged into the Abyss when her Count reaches zero. She meets Licht Bach, a mysterious masked swordsman.
anime.title: Plunderer

anime.description: In a future world where humanity is endangered by giant beasts, children pilot robots called Franxx. Hiro, a former prodigy pilot, meets Zero Two, a mysterious and elite pilot with a dangerous reputation, and their fates become intertwined.
anime.title: Darling in the FranXX

anime.description: Yuji Itadori is a high school student with exceptional physical abilities and a kind heart. He becomes a Jujutsu Sorcerer to fight curses and protect humanity.
anime.title: Jujutsu Kaisen

anime.description: Follow the misadventures of a ragtag crew of bounty hunters traveling in their spaceship, the Bebop, as they hunt criminals and deal with their pasts.
anime.title: Cowboy Bebop

anime.description: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, struggles to find an opponent who can challenge him.
anime.title: One Punch Man

anime.description: Cid Kagenou desires to be a mastermind who pulls the strings from the shadows. He accidentally builds a secret organization while pretending to be a nobody.
anime.title: The Eminence in Shadow

anime.description: The eccentric samurai Gintoki Sakata and his friends take on odd jobs in a world where aliens have invaded feudal Japan.
anime.title: Gintama

anime.description: Ichigo Kurosaki becomes a Soul Reaper to protect the living world from evil spirits and guide souls to the afterlife.
anime.title: Bleach

anime.description: Makunouchi Ippo, a shy high school student, discovers his passion for boxing and begins his journey to become a champion.
anime.title: Hajime no Ippo

anime.description: Shigeo 'Mob' Kageyama is an average middle school boy with psychic powers. He struggles to keep his emotions in check to prevent his powers from going out of control.
anime.title: Mob Psycho 100

anime.description: Tanjiro Kamado embarks on a journey as a Demon Slayer to protect humanity and his family.
anime.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba

anime.description: Lelouch Lamperouge, a prince exiled from the Britannian Empire, gains the power of Geass and leads a rebellion against the empire.
anime.title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

anime.description: Light Yagami, a high school student, discovers a notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name in it. He uses it to create a utopia, but is pursued by a genius detective known as L.
anime.title: Death Note
